transcript: Why shouldn't he dream about him? Walk the nights waiting for him? Do we contradict him? Do we say outright that we don't have any hope anymore that we haven't had any hope for a long time now?

segments.text: Why shouldn't he dream about him? Walk the nights waiting for him?
Do we contradict him? Do we say outright that we don't
have any hope anymore that we haven't had any hope for a long time now?

metadata.transcript_ground_truth: Why shouldn't he dream about him, walk the nights waiting for him?  Do we contradict him?  Do we say outright that we don't have any hope anymore?  That we haven't had any hope for a long time?
